scripts.ecs: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php vendor/bin/ecs check
scripts.phpunit: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php php artisan test
scripts.phpunit:coverage: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=coverage -T php php artisan test --coverage-clover="coverage/phpunit/clover.xml" --coverage-html="coverage/phpunit/clover_html"
scripts.test: npm run phpunit && npm run jest
scripts.test:coverage: npm run phpunit:coverage && npm run jest:coverage
scripts.cypress:setup: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php php artisan migrate:fresh && docker compose exec -T -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off php php artisan db:seed --class CypressSeeder && npm run dev
scripts.cypress:spec: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php php artisan migrate:fresh && docker compose exec -T -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off php php artisan db:seed --class CypressSeeder && cypress run --spec
scripts.test:e2e: npm run cypress:setup && npx cypress run
scripts.lint: npm run ecs && npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.lint:fix: npm run ecs:fix && npm run eslint:fix && npm run prettier:fix
scripts.algolia:config:sync: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php php artisan scout:sync
scripts.data:fresh-seed: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
scripts.data:search-sync: docker compose exec -e PHP_XDEBUG_MODE=off -T php php artisan scout:reimport
